# hive-ui-button

## Properties

| Property   | Attribute  | Description                                              | Type                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     | Default     |
| ---------- | ---------- | -------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `bold`     | `bold`     |                                                          | `boolean`                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                | `undefined` |
| `color`    | `color`    | The color display of the button.                         | `"app-light-gray" \| "black" \| "blue" \| "charcoal" \| "dark-blue" \| "dark-gray" \| "gold" \| "light-blue" \| "light-gray" \| "light-green" \| "magenta" \| "medium-blue" \| "medium-gray" \| "medium-green" \| "medium-yellow" \| "mint" \| "purple" \| "red" \| "white" \| "yellow"` | `'blue'`    |
| `disabled` | `disabled` | If the button is disabled and cannot be interacted with. | `boolean`                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                | `false`     |
| `small`    | `small`    |                                                          | `boolean`                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                | `undefined` |
| `type`     | `type`     | The type of button to render                             | `"button" \| "link" \| "menu" \| "submit"`                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               | `'button'`  |
| `xsmall`   | `xsmall`   |                                                          | `boolean`                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                | `undefined` |


## Events

| Event | Description                                   | Type               |
| ----- | --------------------------------------------- | ------------------ |
| `tap` | Event emitted each time the button is clicked | `CustomEvent<any>` |


## CSS Custom Properties

| Name              | Description                                           |
| ----------------- | ----------------------------------------------------- |
| `--inner-padding` | The inner padding surrounding the text of the button. |
